note.p: Education: Winchester College; Trinity College, Oxford. AB (1739), AM (1740), MB (1741), MD (1744)

Career: Practised as a physician in Reading, specialising in treatment of insanity; Physician and/or proprietor of a private asylum, Reading; moved to London (1754); left practice (1780); bought the estate of Upottery, Devon; returned to Reading; attended the King as Physician (1788)
Notes: Note on certificate: 'Ballotted & rejected May 1 1755'
